english.segment1: This world will try to shut me down
english.segment2: Push and shove me to the ground but I
english.segment3: I been covered by the blood of Christ
english.segment4: I am His and He is mine
english.segment5: May be hated but this ain't my town
english.segment7: But there's a joy in the suffering
english.segment11: I'm a stranger in this land
english.segment13: No matter what comes my way
english.segment15: I will keep my eyes on you
english.segment16: Knowing You will see me through
english.segment17: No matter what comes my way
english.segment19: Cause You got me in Your hand
english.segment20: Cause You got me in Your hand
english.segment22: It's always darkest before the dawn
english.segment23: But I can see the rising sun as it
english.segment24: Shines bright of what's to come
english.segment25: My hope will never be undone
english.segment27: I'm a stranger in this land
english.segment29: No matter what comes my way
english.segment31: I will keep my eyes on you
english.segment32: Knowing You will see me through
english.segment33: No matter what comes my way
english.segment35: Cause You got me in Your hand
english.segment36: Cause You got me in Your hand
english.segment40: There's a day coming I'll see Your face.
